name: DARK MAGIC
description:
You have to go through 16 different levels, fight monsters, overcome traps, etc. You have to collect various items such as coins, stars, candies, fruits, etc. The atmosphere of the game will also immerse you in the fantasy world.


You play as a wizard boy who needs to save his mentor from demons who want to extract dark energy from him in order to resurrect a creature named Zordel. You will have to go through difficult trials to save the old man from death!


Colorful hand-drawn graphics
Funny music
Simple controls
16 levels
Various opponents
